price: 30. Et nous n’avions aucune autorité sur vous. Vous étiez vous-mêmes portés à la transgression.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيۡكُم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنِۭۖ بَلۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا طَٰغِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna lanā ʿalaykum min sul'ṭānin bal kuntum qawman ṭāghīna
